price: 10. Béni soit Celui Qui, s’Il le veut, te dispensera des dons bien meilleurs : des jardins sous lesquels coulent les rivières et des palais (spécialement) édifiés pour toi.
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِن شَآءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡرٗا مِّن ذَٰلِكَ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ وَيَجۡعَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī in shāa jaʿala laka khayran min dhālika jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru wayajʿal laka quṣūran
